nodes.text: The crime lord Gornt Seron maintained a castle in the Korbin Equatorial Range on the planet Korbin. The castle was located on a mountain ledge, which only two entrances; a docking facility on the side of the cliff accessible by repulsorcraft or starship, or a guard station on the ground. All access to the castle had to be approved by Seron or his lieutenant, Jontin, and the castle was ringed by a sensor network that ranged out to two kilometers.
